defaults.name: aileron_gain
defaults.info:
Aileron gain value for use in dynamic forces calculations
Higher gain will reach Max sooner

defaults.name: max_aileron_coeff
defaults.info:
Aileron maximum value for use in dynamic forces calculationst

This is a percentage of the spring force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: elevator_gain
defaults.info:
Elevator gain value for use in dynamic forces calculations
Higher gain will reach Max sooner

defaults.name: max_elevator_coeff
defaults.info:
Elevator maximum value for use in dynamic forces calculations

This is a percentage of the spring force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: rudder_gain
defaults.info:
Rudder gain value for use in dynamic forces calculations
Higher gain will reach Max sooner

defaults.name: max_rudder_coeff
defaults.info:
Rudder maximum value for use in dynamic forces calculations

This is a percentage of the spring force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: cyclic_spring_gain
defaults.info: Strength of cyclic spring

defaults.name: elevator_force_trim
defaults.info: Enable force tirm for elevator axis

defaults.name: aileron_force_trim
defaults.info: Enable force tirm for aileron axis

defaults.name: force_trim_button
defaults.info: Button # to hold to release spring while moving axis

defaults.name: force_trim_reset_button
defaults.info: Button # to recenter spring trims

defaults.name: trim_workaround
defaults.info: Apply artificial trim movement - only for aircraft that do not support native FFB trim<b><b>(AV8B, Mig-19)

defaults.name: pedal_trimming_enabled
defaults.info: Enable pedal trimming feedback for fixed wing aircfraft

defaults.name: aircraft_is_spring_centered
defaults.info:
Enable spring centering for aircraft while maintaining dynamic forces

Do not use together with FBW

defaults.name: aileron_spring_gain
defaults.info:
Aileron spring gain when "aircraft is spring centered" is enabled

This is a percentage of the spring force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: elevator_spring_gain
defaults.info:
Elevator spring gain when "aircraft is spring centered" is enabled

This is a percentage of the spring force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: rudder_spring_gain
defaults.info:
Rudder spring gain when "aircraft is spring centered" is enabled

This is a percentage of the spring force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: aircraft_is_fbw
defaults.info: Identify aircraft as FBW if Simconnect data is inaccurate

defaults.name: fbw_aileron_gain
defaults.info:
Fixed spring gain for FBW aircraft

This is a percentage of the spring force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: fbw_elevator_gain
defaults.info:
Fixed spring gain for FBW aircraft

This is a percentage of the spring force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: fbw_rudder_gain
defaults.info:
Fixed spring gain for FBW aircraft

This is a percentage of the spring force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: elevator_droop_moment
defaults.info: Strength of elevator droop at rest (pushes stick forward)

defaults.name: elevator_prop_flow_ratio
defaults.info: Scaling of dynamic effects on elevator

defaults.name: prop_diameter
defaults.info: Aircraft Prop Diameter

defaults.name: rudder_prop_flow_ratio
defaults.info: Scaling of dynamic effects on rudder

defaults.name: collective_ap_spring_gain
defaults.info: Strength of spring force in Autopilot

defaults.name: pedal_spring_mode
defaults.info: Pedal spring mode. See manual for use.

defaults.name: pedal_spring_gain
defaults.info: Percent of spring setting in VPForce Configurator

defaults.name: pedal_dampening_gain
defaults.info: Percent of damper setting in VPForce Configurator

defaults.name: pedal_advanced_dummy
defaults.info: Advanced Pedal Mode Settings - Dynamic Spring mode only.
defaults.displayname: Advanced Pedal Mode Settings (Dynamic Mode Only)

defaults.name: aircraft_vs_speed
defaults.info: Stall Speed

defaults.name: aircraft_vs_gain
defaults.info: Spring gain when aircraft at Vs

defaults.name: aircraft_vne_speed
defaults.info: Never Exceed Speed

defaults.name: aircraft_vne_gain
defaults.info: Spring gain when aircraft is at Vne

defaults.name: telemffb_controls_axes
defaults.info:
TelemFFB sends axis position to sim

Required for Trim/AP Following

** Do not assign in game or SPAD.next **

defaults.name: telemffb_controls_axes
defaults.info:
TelemFFB sends axis position to sim

Required for Trim/AP Following

defaults.name: joystick_x_axis_scale
defaults.info: Scaling of axis position sent to game

defaults.name: joystick_y_axis_scale
defaults.info: Scaling of axis position sent to game

defaults.name: rudder_x_axis_scale
defaults.info: Scaling of axis position sent to game

defaults.name: hands_on_deadzone
defaults.info: Distance required to trigger a hands-on condition

defaults.name: hands_off_deadzone
defaults.info: Distance at which hands-off resumes (set lower than hands-on)

defaults.name: enable_custom_x_axis
defaults.info: Custom Simconnect Variable - use "VARNAME" for simvars or "L:VARNAME" for LVARS

defaults.name: custom_x_axis
defaults.info: Custom Simconnect Variable - use "VARNAME" for simvars or "L:VARNAME" for LVARS

defaults.name: custom_x_axis
defaults.info: Custom Simconnect Variable - use "VARNAME" for simvars or "L:VARNAME" for LVARS

defaults.name: raw_x_axis_scale
defaults.info: Bit Range Scaling

defaults.name: enable_custom_y_axis
defaults.info: Custom Simconnect Variable - use "VARNAME" for simvars or "L:VARNAME" for LVARS

defaults.name: custom_y_axis
defaults.info: Custom Simconnect Variable - use "VARNAME" for simvars or "L:VARNAME" for LVARS

defaults.name: custom_y_axis
defaults.info: Custom Simconnect Variable - use "VARNAME" for simvars or "L:VARNAME" for LVARS

defaults.name: raw_y_axis_scale
defaults.info: Bit Range Scaling

defaults.name: trim_following
defaults.info: Enable physical stick movement with in-game trims

defaults.name: joystick_trim_follow_gain_physical_x
defaults.info: Aileron/Cyclic Lateral physical movement scalar

defaults.name: joystick_trim_follow_gain_physical_y
defaults.info: Elevator/Cyclic Longitudinal physical movement scalar

defaults.name: joystick_trim_follow_gain_virtual_y
defaults.info:
Adjust virtual y % so that trim ingame does not pitch aircraft when stick held.

To configure, slowly apply nose down trim. if the nose goes up, raise the virtual % - if the nose goes down, lower the virtual % - you can go negative.

defaults.name: rudder_trim_follow_gain_physical_x
defaults.info: Rudder physical trim movement scalar

defaults.name: ap_following
defaults.info: Enable physical stick following of autopilot movements

defaults.name: invert_ap_x_axis
defaults.info: If aircraft becomes unstable with AP Following and wants to flip inverted, try this option

defaults.name: gforce_effect_enable
defaults.info: See manual for details

defaults.name: gforce_effect_max_intensity
defaults.info: Max force to apply during effect (% of VPf Conf 'constant')

defaults.name: gforce_effect_curvature
defaults.info: Affects the onset characteristics of the G-Force effect. See manual for details

defaults.name: gforce_min_gs
defaults.info: G loading where effect will start

defaults.name: gforce_max_gs
defaults.info: G loading where effect will max out

defaults.name: cm_vibration_intensity
defaults.info: Peak intensity for countermeasure release effect

defaults.name: gun_vibration_intensity
defaults.info: Peak intenstiy for gunfire effect

defaults.name: weapon_release_intensity
defaults.info: Peak intensity for weapons release effect

defaults.name: weapon_effect_direction
defaults.info:
Direction of applied force for weapons effects

Rrange 0-359 or set to -1 for random

defaults.name: elevator_droop_enabled
defaults.info: Simulate Elevator droop at low speeds <20Kt

defaults.name: elevator_droop_force
defaults.info: Simulate Elevator droop at low speeds <20Kt

defaults.name: etl_effect_enable
defaults.info: Enable Effective Translational Lift Shimmy

defaults.name: etl_effect_intensity
defaults.info: Effective Translational Lift Shimmy Intensity

defaults.name: etl_start_speed
defaults.info: speed at which the ETL effect will start - m/s

defaults.name: etl_stop_speed
defaults.info: speed at which the ETL effect will stop - m/s

defaults.name: heli_engine_rumble_intensity
defaults.info: peak rumble intensity for helicopter engine/rotor effect

defaults.name: vrs_effect_enable
defaults.info: Vortex Ring State effect

defaults.name: vrs_effect_intensity
defaults.info: Max intensity of VRS effect

defaults.name: afterburner_effect_enabled
defaults.info: Enable afterburner rumble effect

defaults.name: afterburner_effect_intensity
defaults.info: Max intensity of afterburner rumble effect

defaults.name: engine_prop_rumble_enabled
defaults.info: Enable Propeller Rumble

defaults.name: engine_rumble_lowrpm
defaults.info: low RPM threshold for low rpm intensity setting

defaults.name: engine_rumble_lowrpm_intensity
defaults.info: peak intenstiy of engine rumble at low RPM threshold

defaults.name: engine_rumble_highrpm
defaults.info: high RPM threshold for high rpm intensity setting

defaults.name: engine_rumble_highrpm_intensity
defaults.info: peak intensity of engine rumble at high RPM threshold

defaults.name: jet_engine_rumble_freq
defaults.info: Most DCS helos are jet driven, enable the jet engine effect

defaults.name: il2_enable_buffet
defaults.info:
These effects are duplicates of IL-2 native effects

. Recommend to disable 'shake' in IL-2 FFB settings when using these effects.

defaults.name: il2_buffeting_factor
defaults.info: common setting for all buffeting (stall, gear, etc) - IL2 limitation

defaults.name: aoa_effect_enabled
defaults.info: Enable or disable the dynamic Angle of Attack (AoA) based force effect

defaults.name: aoa_effect_gain
defaults.info: Amount of calculated AOA effect to apply

defaults.name: max_aoa_cf_force
defaults.info: Maximum constant force to apply for the AoA effect

defaults.name: aoa_reduction_effect_enabled
defaults.info: Enable or disable the AoA reduction force effect

defaults.name: aoa_reduction_max_force
defaults.info:
Max constant force to apply for AoA Reduction Effect

This is a percentage of the constant force value in VPforce Configurator

defaults.name: critical_aoa_max
defaults.info: AoA at which applied force maxes out

defaults.name: critical_aoa_start
defaults.info: AoA at which to begin applying force

defaults.name: buffeting_intensity
defaults.info: Peak AoA buffeting intensity

defaults.name: aoa_buffet_freq
defaults.info: Frequency of buffeting effect (Hz)

defaults.name: buffet_aoa
defaults.info: AoA when buffeting starts

defaults.name: stall_aoa
defaults.info: Stall Angle of Attack

defaults.name: canopy_motion_intensity
defaults.info: Peak vibration intensity when canopy is moving

defaults.name: damage_effect_intensity
defaults.info: Peak vibration intensity when flaps are moving

defaults.name: deceleration_effect_enable
defaults.info: Deceleration effect pulls the stick forward when on the ground and decelerating

defaults.name: deceleration_max_force
defaults.info: Deceleration effect pulls the stick forward when on the ground and decelerating

defaults.name: flaps_motion_intensity
defaults.info: Peak vibration intensity when flaps are moving

defaults.name: gear_buffet_intensity
defaults.info: Peak intensity for gear drag buffeting effect

defaults.name: gear_buffet_freq
defaults.info: Frequency of buffeting effect (Hz)

defaults.name: gear_buffet_speed_low
defaults.info: Minimum intensity (low) speed for gear buffeting effect

defaults.name: gear_buffet_speed_high
defaults.info: Maximum intensity (high) speed for gear buffeting effect

defaults.name: gear_motion_intensity
defaults.info: Peak vibration intensity when gear is moving

defaults.name: runway_rumble_enabled
defaults.info: Enable/disable runway rumble effect

defaults.name: runway_rumble_intensity
defaults.info: Peak runway rumble intensity

defaults.name: speedbrake_buffet_intensity
defaults.info: Peak intensity for speed brake buffeting effect

defaults.name: speedbrake_motion_intensity
defaults.info: Peak intensity for speed brake motion effect

defaults.name: spoiler_buffet_intensity
defaults.info: peak buffeting intensity when spoilers deployed

defaults.name: spoiler_motion_intensity
defaults.info: F14 Only, peak vibration intensity when spoilers are moving

defaults.name: uncoordinated_turn_effect_enabled
defaults.info: Simulate lateral acceleration effect on stick in uncoordinated turns

defaults.name: wind_effect_max_intensity
defaults.info: Adjust the maximum intensity the wind effect can attain

defaults.name: wind_effect_scaling
defaults.info: Adjust the overall intensity of the wind effect

defaults.name: center_spring_on_pause
defaults.info: Force spring centering when in pause/slew mode

defaults.name: config_override_enable
defaults.info: Change VPConfigurator Sliders. Currently INOP

defaults.name: vpconf
defaults.info:
Load a specific .vpconf file (created with VPForce Configurator)

When using this function, it will remain active until set again by another sim, class, or model setting
